title: Multiple Gazebo/DRCSim versions need to be merged

content.raw: We were using the control synchronization that needed the drcsim-prelease package to be installed.  Of course this forces installation of Gazebo 1.6.  For quals, we need the new Gazebo 1.7.2 binary, but (even though the newest drsim is 2.5.2-1) the drcsim still doesn't support the schronization message to the AtlasPlugin.  When will we see a usable version of the sychronized control with all the improvments to Gazebo logging?
content.html: We were using the control synchronization that needed the drcsim-prelease package to be installed. Of course this forces installation of Gazebo 1.6. For quals, we need the new Gazebo 1.7.2 binary, but (even though the newest drsim is 2.5.2-1) the drcsim still doesn't support the schronization message to the AtlasPlugin. When will we see a usable version of the sychronized control with all the improvments to Gazebo logging?
